string.name: freeTrialActiveSubscriptionsData
string.instruction: Placeholder is a date in format MMMM dd, yyyy, second is if trial is monthly or yearly

resources.string: Your free trial ends on %1$s & automatically converts to a %2$s paid subscription on that day.

string.name: freeTrialCancelledSubscriptionsData
string.instruction: Placeholder is a date in format MMMM dd, yyyy

resources.string: Your free trial ends on %1$s & will not convert to a paid subscription.
